title: Treebeard, Earthborn (4R103)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Ally • Home 2T & 8T • Ent
Strength:	12
Vitality:	4
Site:	2T, 8T
Game Text:	Unhasty. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to be discarded, stack him here instead. Fellowship: Exert Treebeard and add(1) to play an unbound Hobbit stacked here.
Lore:	”'Do not be hasty, that is my motto.'”
Rarity:	R
